mapper.insert: insert into news (news_id, title, show, time, delfig) values (#{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{show,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
